description.narrative: The Development Objectives of the Project are to: (a) provide additional rail transport capacity, improved service quality and higher freight throughput on the Khurja - Kanpur section and the Khurja – Dadri section of the Eastern rail corridor; and (b) develop the institutional capacity of DFCCIL to build and maintain the DFC infrastructure network.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement Legal Agreement | Description: The Borrower shall ensure that an Empowered Committee (EC) is established andmaintained throughout the period of Project implementation to address inter-ministerial and state-level issues.| Due Date :

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall engage quality and safety audit consultant (QSAC), withqualifications and experience, and under terms of reference acceptable to the Bank, to provide the DFCCIL and the Bank quarterlymonitoring reports throughout the Project's construction period| Due Date :

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall ensure construction sites under a given stretch of railways asspecified in proposed construction contracts between DFCCIL and its contractors, shall be available encumbrance free to contractorsfor construction activities | Due Date :

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall have agreed with all civil works and track contractorspartial/phased plans for the installation of electrical, signaling and telecommunications systems under the Project to enablecontractors to complete their work in accordance with the agreed work program prior to award of any contract | Due Date :

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall have the overall responsibility for day-to-day Projectimplementation and appoint and maintain, suitably qualified personnel in adequate numbers, to carry out the functions ofprocurement, contract management, financial management, social and environmental management, and general Project oversight,monitoring and reporting | Due Date :

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall maintain social and environmental management units at the DFCCILheadquarters and its field offices, with functions, powers, staff and resources necessary and appropriate for: (i) implementingsocial and environmental safeguards measures required under the RAP, the RPF and the EMP, and (ii) in the event of any majoralteration in alignment under the Project, prior to issuance of the request for proposals under the altered alignment, ensuringthat the EMP and the RAP shall be updated and approved by the Bank, and that necessary and required social and environmentalclearances are obtained from the Borrower's relevant authorities;| Due Date:

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :Submit an annual work program of linked activities is to the Bank for its reviewand comments and that said annual work program is implemented taking into account the Bank#s comments thereon. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :The Borrower shall cause DFCCIL to prepare and furnish to the Bank not laterthan 45 days after the end of each Financial Year quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the project. | Frequency:Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :The borrower through MOR, shall ensure that the provisions of the resettlementaction plan and environmental management plan are not amended, revised, or waived without the prior agreement of the Bank; |Frequency :

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :The borrower through MOR, shall prepare a resettlement action plan, acceptable tothe Bank, in accordance with the guidelines and procedures set forth in the RPF, and thereafter resettlement action plan isimplemented, in a form and substance satisfactory to the Bank; | Frequency :

Finance Agreement :Legal Agreement | Description :The borrower through MOR, shall prepare an environmental management plan,acceptable to the Bank, in accordance with the guidelines and procedures set forth in the EMF, and thereafter environmentalmanagement plan is implemented in a form and substance satisfactory to the Bank; | Frequency :

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall carry out a comprehensive mid-term Project review, and shall byFeb 1, 2014, prepare and furnish to the Bank a mid-term Project progress report, satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :01-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall constitute or appoint district-level grievance redressalcommittees; a Sr. level grievance committee, and an Ombudsman, with powers, functions, capacity, and resources. | Due Date:30-Sep-2011

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall prepare and furnish to the Bank as part of the Project Report notlater than 45 days after the end of each Financial Year quarter. | Frequency: Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall provide to the Borrower and Bank an initial impact study of theProject conducted under terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :31-Dec-2015

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall submit to the Bank, not later than June 30 of each year startingJune 30, 2012, an annual progress report on the implementation of GAAP. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall, by Dec 31, starting Dec 31, 2012, undertake an annual review ofthe results and experiences in implementing the RAP and the RFP, and thereafter promptly submit the review results. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement | Description :DFCCIL shall, not later than September 30, 2011, enter into a ConcessionAgreement with MOR, and prior to the commissioning of the facilities financed by the Loan. | Due Date :28-Feb-2014

Finance Agreement: Legal Agreement | Description: DFCCIL shall agree with a respective and relevant local authority and/orutilities on a system interconnection and relocation plan to enable contractors to complete their work. | Due Date:

Finance Agreement: Legal Agreement | Description: DFCCIL shall ensure all required and necessary environmental clearances for trackalignment approved by DFCCIL have been issued by the Borrower's relevant authorities | Due Date:

Finance Agreement: Legal Agreement | Description: DFCCIL shall have agreed with a respective and relevant local authority and/orutilities on a system interconnection and relocation plan to enable contractors to complete their work prior to award of anycontract | Due Date:

Finance Agreement: Legal Agreement | Description: The Borrower shall make the proceeds of the Loan available to DFCCIL under asubsidiary agreement between the Borrower, through MOR, and DFCCIL, satisfactory to the Bank. The Borrower shall, through MOR,provide its counterpart contribution as required by the Project to DFCCIL in a timely and adequate manner. | Due Date:
